appetizers.name: Aloo Bonda
appetizers.description: Lightly spiced potatoes with a touch of mustard seeds and curry leaves, dipped in chickpea batter and golden fried.

appetizers.name: Pudina Kabob
appetizers.description: Chicken breast, fresh mint, ginger, garlic, light spices. Cooked in tandoor oven.

entrees.name: Tandoori Paneer Tikka
entrees.description: Cubes of paneer (homemade cheese) marinated with yogurt and spices cooked in the clay oven.

entrees.name: Nargisi Chicken Kofta
entrees.description: Boiled egg coated with lightly spiced minced chicken, topped with a cashew cream sauce.

entrees.name: Gobi Gosht
entrees.description: Lamb cubes cooked with lightly spiced cauliflower.

entrees.name: Shrimp Saag
entrees.description: Slightly saut√©ed shrimps cooked with fresh spinach and spices.
